Sly Charge.name: Sly Charge
Sly Charge.flavor: Rather than run into your waiting enemy, you flick a small weapon at it first to distract it as you rush in.
Sly Charge.effect: You charge and make the following attack in place of a melee basic attack. If you’re wielding a light thrown weapon, you can make a ranged basic attack against the target with that weapon as a free action before the charge. If the ranged attack hits, the target grants combat advantage to you until the start of your next turn.
Sly Charge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Stay Mobile.name: Stay Mobile
Stay Mobile.flavor: You dart in to deliver a stinging blow to your enemy, then spring back out of harm’s way.
Stay Mobile.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target misses you with a melee attack, you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Main Gauche Parry.name: Main Gauche Parry
Main Gauche Parry.flavor: Lesson twenty-three of the tempest technique—a well-timed parry with a light blade can save life and loin.
Main Gauche Parry.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons, one of which is a light blade that has the off-hand property.
Main Gauche Parry.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Main Gauche Parry.effect: You gain a +4 bonus to AC and Reflex until the start of your next turn.
